description: The requirement is to procure 16 items including fasteners, nuts, sleeves, hoses, and other components for trailers.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Trailer Spare Parts

#### Reference: W8486-259902/A

Published: November 15, 2024

Closing Date: January 6, 2025, at 14:00 EST

#### Description

The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of trailer spare parts. The contract is open to all qualified suppliers, and the tender process is competitive, with the lowest price being the selection criterion.

#### Items to be Supplied

The following trailer spare parts are required:

1. 4 x Cylinder Spring Loaded Fasteners (GSIN: 5340, NSN: 00-0402075)
2. 4 x Self-Locking Hexagonal Nuts (GSIN 5310, NSN: 00-2351078)
3. 36 x Self-Locking Hexagonal Nuts (GSIN: 5310, NSN: 00-9824908)
4. 4 x Self-Locking Plate Nuts (GSIN: 5310, NSN: 01-4895233)
5. 8 x Sleeves (GSIN: 3120, NSN: 00-7521829)
6. 8 x Non-Metallic Hose Assemblies (GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-0314387)
7. 8 x Pneumatic Tire Valves (GSIN: 2640, NSN: 01-4847406)
8. 4 x Emergency Relay Valves (GSIN: 2530, NSN: 00-1188589)
9. 4 x Hydraulic Brake Master Cylinder Assemblies (GSIN: 2530, NSN: 00-2044800)
10. 2 x Thermostat Assemblies with Drain (GSIN: 6685, NSN: 20-0059905)
11. 6 x Air Brake Chamber Assemblies (GSIN: 2530, NSN: 00-7411020)
12. 12 x Hydraulic Brake Wheel Cylinder Assemblies (GSIN: 2530, NSN: 01-2529554)
13. 4 x Leaf Spring Assemblies (GSIN: 2510, NSN: 21-9108672)
14. 8 x Leaf Spring Pins (GSIN: 2510, NSN: 00-7521826)
15.
